This specification is not final and is subject to change.
For OGC standard, see GeoAPI 3.0.1.

Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.opengis.feature.type
    FeatureType is now defined in the org.opengis.feature package.
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.ResponsibleParty
    org.opengis.metadata.FeatureTypeList
    Not anymore in ISO 19115.
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.AggregateInformation
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by AssociatedResource.
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.NonQuantitativeAttributeAccuracy
    Renamed NonQuantitativeAttributeCorrectness.
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.TemporalAccuracy
    Renamed TemporalQuality.
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Usability
    Renamed UsabilityElement.
    org.opengis.util.CodeList.Filter
    Replaced by Predicate from the standard Java library.
    org.opengis.util.RecordSchema
    The RecordSchema interface has been removed in the 2015 revision of ISO 19103 standard.
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.MediumName
    This code list is not anymore part of ISO 19115:2014, since MediumName has been replaced by Citation. This change may be applied in GeoAPI 4.0. See issue #14.
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.CharacterSet
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by a reference to the IANA Character Set register. Represented in Java by Charset.
  • Deprecated Enum Classes
    Enum Class
    Description
    org.opengis.annotation.ComplianceLevel
    has never been used outside a few metadata classes, and core profile is not defined anymore in latest ISO 19115.
  • Deprecated Annotation Interfaces
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    org.opengis.annotation.Profile
    has never been used outside a few metadata classes, and core profile is not defined anymore in latest ISO 19115.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    org.opengis.metadata.constraint.Restriction.LICENSE
    As of ISO 19115:2014, renamed Restriction.LICENCE.
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.AssociationType.LARGER_WORD_CITATION
    Renamed LARGER_WORK_CITATION.
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.AssociationType.SOURCE
    Removed in ISO 19115:2014.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Citation.getCollectiveTitle()
    Removed as of ISO 19115:2014.
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Contact.getAddress()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Contact.getAddresses().
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Contact.getOnlineResource()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Contact.getOnlineResources().
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Contact.getPhone()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Contact.getPhones().
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.ResponsibleParty.getContactInfo()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Party.getContactInfo().
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.ResponsibleParty.getIndividualName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by getName() in Individual.
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.ResponsibleParty.getOrganisationName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by getName() in Organisation.
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.ResponsibleParty.getPositionName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Individual.getPositionName().
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Telephone.getFacsimiles()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by a number with TelephoneType.FACSIMILE.
    org.opengis.metadata.citation.Telephone.getVoices()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by a number with TelephoneType.VOICE.
    org.opengis.metadata.content.CoverageDescription.getContentType()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, moved to AttributeGroup.getContentTypes().
    org.opengis.metadata.content.CoverageDescription.getDimensions()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, moved to AttributeGroup.getAttributes().
    org.opengis.metadata.content.FeatureCatalogueDescription.getFeatureTypes()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by FeatureCatalogueDescription.getFeatureTypeInfo().
    org.opengis.metadata.content.FeatureCatalogueDescription.getLanguages()
    Replaced by getLocalesAndCharsets().keySet().
    org.opengis.metadata.content.RangeDimension.getDescriptor()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, renamed RangeDimension.getDescription().
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.DataFile.getFileFormat()
    Removed in latest XSD schemas.
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.DigitalTransferOptions.getOffLine()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by DigitalTransferOptions.getOffLines().
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.Format.getName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Format.getFormatSpecificationCitation().getAlternateTitles(). Note that citation alternate titles are often used for abbreviations.
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.Format.getSpecification()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Format.getFormatSpecificationCitation().getTitle().
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.Format.getVersion()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Format.getFormatSpecificationCitation().getEdition().
    org.opengis.metadata.distribution.Medium.getDensities()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Medium.getDensity().
    org.opengis.metadata.ExtendedElementInformation.getDomainCode()
    Removed as of ISO 19115:2014.
    org.opengis.metadata.ExtendedElementInformation.getRationales()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by ExtendedElementInformation.getRationale().
    org.opengis.metadata.ExtendedElementInformation.getShortName()
    Removed as of ISO 19115:2014.
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.AggregateInformation.getAggregateDataSetIdentifier()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by an identifier of AggregateInformation.getAggregateDataSetName().
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.AggregateInformation.getAggregateDataSetName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by AssociatedResource.getName().
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.DataIdentification.getCharacterSets()
    Replaced by getLocalesAndCharsets().values().
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.DataIdentification.getLanguages()
    Replaced by getLocalesAndCharsets().keySet().
    org.opengis.metadata.identification.Identification.getAggregationInfo()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Identification.getAssociatedResources().
    org.opengis.metadata.lineage.Source.getScaleDenominator()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, moved to Resolution.getEquivalentScale().
    org.opengis.metadata.lineage.Source.getSourceExtents()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, moved to Scope.getExtents().
    org.opengis.metadata.maintenance.MaintenanceInformation.getDateOfNextUpdate()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by MaintenanceInformation.getMaintenanceDates() in order to enable inclusion of a DateType to describe the type of the date. Note that DateType.NEXT_UPDATE was added to that code list.
    org.opengis.metadata.maintenance.MaintenanceInformation.getUpdateScopeDescriptions()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, MaintenanceInformation.getUpdateScopes() and getUpdateScopeDescriptions() were combined into MaintenanceInformation.getMaintenanceScopes() in order to allow specifying a scope that includes a spatial and temporal extent.
    org.opengis.metadata.maintenance.MaintenanceInformation.getUpdateScopes()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, getUpdateScopes() and MaintenanceInformation.getUpdateScopeDescriptions() were combined into MaintenanceInformation.getMaintenanceScopes() in order to allow specifying a scope that includes a spatial and temporal extent.
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getCharacterSet()
    As of GeoAPI 3.1, replaced by getLocalesAndCharsets().values().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getDataSetUri()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getIdentificationInfo() followed by Identification.getCitation() followed by Citation.getOnlineResources() followed by OnlineResource.getLinkage().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getDateStamp()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getDateInfo().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getFileIdentifier()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getMetadataIdentifier() in order to include the codespace attribute.
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getHierarchyLevelNames()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getMetadataScopes() followed by MetadataScope.getName().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getHierarchyLevels()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getMetadataScopes() followed by MetadataScope.getResourceScope().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getLanguage()
    As of GeoAPI 3.1, replaced by Metadata.getLocalesAndCharsets().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getLocales()
    As of GeoAPI 3.1, replaced by Metadata.getLocalesAndCharsets().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getMetadataStandardName()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getMetadataStandards() followed by Citation.getTitle().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getMetadataStandardVersion()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getMetadataStandards() followed by Citation.getEdition().
    org.opengis.metadata.Metadata.getParentIdentifier()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Metadata.getParentMetadata().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.CoverageResult.getResultContentDescription()
    Replaced by CoverageResult.getResultContent().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.DataQuality.getLineage()
    Removed from ISO 19157:2013.
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getDates()
    Replaced by EvaluationMethod.getDates().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getEvaluationMethodDescription()
    Replaced by EvaluationMethod.getEvaluationMethodDescription().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getEvaluationMethodType()
    Replaced by EvaluationMethod.getEvaluationMethodType().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getEvaluationProcedure()
    Replaced by EvaluationMethod.getEvaluationProcedure().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getMeasureDescription()
    Replaced by MeasureReference.getMeasureDescription().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getMeasureIdentification()
    Replaced by MeasureReference.getMeasureIdentification().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Element.getNamesOfMeasure()
    Replaced by MeasureReference.getNamesOfMeasure().
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.QuantitativeResult.getErrorStatistic()
    Removed from ISO 19157:2013.
    org.opengis.metadata.quality.Scope.getExtent()
    As of ISO 19115:2014, replaced by Scope.getExtents().
    org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransformFactory.createFromXML(String)
    This method was defined in OGC 01-009 in anticipation for future normative specification, but no XML format for math transforms have been defined.
    org.opengis.referencing.operation.OperationMethod.getSourceDimensions()
    This attribute has been removed from ISO 19111:2019.
    org.opengis.referencing.operation.OperationMethod.getTargetDimensions()
    This attribute has been removed from ISO 19111:2019.
    org.opengis.util.CodeList.valueOf(Class<T>, CodeList.Filter)
    Since deprecation of CodeList.Filter, replaced by CodeList.valueOf(Class, Predicate, String).
    org.opengis.util.Record.getAttributes()
    Renamed Record.getFields().
    org.opengis.util.Record.locate(MemberName)
    This method has been removed in ISO 19103:2015. The same functionality is available with Record.getFields().get(name).
    org.opengis.util.Record.set(MemberName, Object)
    Use Record.getFields().put(name, value) instead.
    org.opengis.util.RecordType.getContainer()
    The RecordSchema interface has been removed in the 2015 revision of ISO 19103 standard.
    org.opengis.util.RecordType.getMemberTypes()
    Renamed RecordType.getFieldTypes().
    org.opengis.util.RecordType.locate(MemberName)
    This method has been removed in ISO 19103:2015. The same functionality is available with RecordType.getFieldTypes().get(name).getTypeName().
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19139
    since Specification.ISO_19115_3 publication, this standard does not define new elements used by GeoAPI.
    org.opengis.annotation.Specification.OGC_03064
    This specification has been retired.
    org.opengis.annotation.Specification.OGC_07022
    To be replaced by Topic 20: Observations and Measurements
    org.opengis.annotation.Specification.UNSPECIFIED
    To be removed.
